# Please use one line per field and one file per project. Do not edit or remove any line starting with #

#organism
organism_species:
organism_variety:
organism_description:
# organism - end


#project
project_name:
project_contact:
project_description:
expr_unit:
index_dir_name:
# project - end


# figure --- All info needed for a cluster of images (usually includes one stage and all its tissues). Copy this block as many times as you need (including as many tissue layer blocks as you need).
figure_name:
conditions:
# write figure metadata

#stage layer
layer_name:
layer_description:
layer_type: stage
bg_color:
layer_image:
image_width:
image_height:
cube_ordinal:
img_ordinal:
organ:
# layer - end

#tissue layer
layer_name:
layer_description: 
layer_type: tissue
bg_color:
layer_image:
image_width:
image_height:
cube_ordinal:
img_ordinal:
organ:
# layer - end

# figure - end
